Job Description: Job vacancy Developer (1 Year) Python / PHP Laravel in Kochi,Kerala    Move your Career forward and Showcase your talent     recruitment process    At StepsOn; We hire, passionate professionals, who are able to deliver the best class service that will enrich our company profile along with our clients. We hire professionals for various posts only by direct application. Here is the recruitment process we follow,      01   Telephonic Interview     After screening online applications the next step is the telephonic interview. This will be done by our HR executives / managerial professionals. In this step, we will just find your, previous live project work experience, current salary details, educational qualification and about you.       02   Direct Interview     After the telephonic interview and assessment, if we find you are appropriate for the company, our HR Executive will call you once again and will fix the date and time for the direct interview. Here we will evaluate your eligibility. If you could clear this phase too here comes the last.       03   Job Offer/Work Contract     Confirmed profiles will receive a Job Confirmation call with specified offers. Now, at this point, you can meet us (the Employer) and learn more about the job offer, joining date, working contract terms conditions, offer customization, etc.       Developer (1 Year) Python / PHP Laravel   02 Dec 2019   Job Description     Web Developers (fresher/experienced) required for the following 2 programming categories   01: NodeJs/AnjularJs + PHP Laravel + MongoDB  or-  02: NodeJs/AnjularJs + Python + MongoDB  - - - - - - -
